snippet: The Miami Dolphins put Jonathan Martin on the reserve/nonfootball illness list, freeing up his roster spot so safety D. J. Campbell could be promoted.
abstract: Miami Dolphins put offensive tackle Jonathan Martin on the reserve/nonfootball illness list, freeing up his roster spot so safety D J Campbell could be promoted from the practice squad.
lead_paragraph: The Miami Dolphins put Jonathan Martin on the reserve/nonfootball illness list, freeing up his roster spot so safety D. J. Campbell could be promoted.
